title: Amarillo Globe-News: Local News, Politics & Sports in Amarillo, TX
text:
Woman’s ‘sons’ flew into her life, and never left

A 96-year-old Amarillo woman and her husband “adopted” five Air Force members. She recalls many joyful moments over the years.
